original_text: Then, in the morning, you will see how great the Lord is. The Lord has heard the bad things that you have said against him. We, Moses and Aaron, are the Lord's servants. So you are complaining against him, not against us!’
korean_text: 아침에는 너희가 여호와의 영광을 보리니 이는 여호와께서 너희가 자기를 향하여 원망함을 들으셨음이라 우리가 누구이기에 너희가 우리에게 대하여 원망하느냐

sentences.original_text: you will see how great the Lord is
sentences.korean_translation: 주님께서 얼마나 위대하신지 보게 될 것입니다

sentences.original_text: the bad things that you have said against him
sentences.korean_translation: 당신들이 그분께 대하여 말한 나쁜 말들을

sentences.original_text: We, Moses and Aaron, are the Lord's servants
So you are complaining against him
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 당신들은 그분께 불평하고 있는 것입니다
